Title: On The Mend
Description: Now that you have won a battle, we need to heal up your pets so they can fight another day!  Visit Erma, our local stable master, to heal and revive your pets.
ObjectivesText: Heal your pets to full health by visiting Erma the Stable Master.
PortraitGiverText: Erma, the local Stable Master, can heal and revive your pets.
